taskDescription: To be aromatic, a molecule must have 4n + 2 π electrons and must have a planar, monocyclic system of conjugation. Cyclodecapentaene fulfills one of these criteria but not the other and has resisted all attempts at synthesis. Explain.
detailedSolution: Cyclodecapentaene is not flat because of steric interactions.
